sys_update_version.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"> <sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <includes/> <macroponent display_value="Record">57c4eb371b858d10b81fdce7cc4bcb6d</macroponent> <name>Set Related Item Content</name> <required_translations>[ ]</required_translations> <script><![CDATA[/** * @param {params} params * @param {api} params.api * @param {any} params.event * @param {any} params.imports */ function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) { var resultTabContent = { ...api.state.relatedTabContent, ...event.payload.relatedTabContent, }; api.setState('relatedTabContent', resultTabContent); }]]></script> <script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version> <sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-01-21 21:02:44</sys_created_on> <sys_id>efc4af371b858d10b81fdce7cc4bcb71</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Set Related Item Content</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_efc4af371b858d10b81fdce7cc4bcb71</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-01-21 21:08:57</sys_updated_on> <type>default</type> </sys_ux_client_script> </record_update>
